Content:
I was trying to look up information on my Yamaha and I couldn't find any details using online vin lookups tools I'm not sure if others in the past have had the same issue but I wanted to share a cool tool to look up the exact specifications of any motorcycle and its free.

All you need is the VIN Number to start a motorcycle VIN lookup

I found that it also works on some classic bikes that my friend was looking to purchase so let me know if you guys find this helpful.

Title: Found a cool tool to check motorcycle VIN lookups
